title: BRIEF-Ilyda SA buys an extra 0.54 mln of its own shares
text:
BRIEF-Ilyda SA buys an extra 0.54 mln of its own shares Sept 28 
Sept 28 Ilyda SA : 
* Says that on Sept. 18, 2015 bought 0.54 million own shares, following transaction owns in total 9.51 percent of its share capital Source text: bit.ly/1QICYGk
